name: UIStatusBarManager
desc: An object that describes the configuration of the status bar.

items.name: var isStatusBarHidden: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the status bar is currently hidden.

items.name: var statusBarStyle: UIStatusBarStyle
items.desc: The current appearance of the status bar.

items.name: var statusBarFrame: CGRect
items.desc: The frame rectangle of the status bar.
